review_text: This machine is very easy to use.  It comes with a handy little recipe book to help you with your first few recipes.  One thing you must do is  freeze the bowl for a good 24 hours the first time, then you will want to  cover the bowl in plastic (to prevent freezer flavors tainting the bowl),  and leave it in your freezer.  You will be making home made ice cream in  about 20 minutes.  The consistancy is good, and it is delicous.  Best of  all, you will not be adding any strange presevatives, or anything you do  not want.  Ben and Jerry's has an excellent recipe book that you can get  here at amazon, and you will be making up tasty ice cream in no time!
summary: No more trips to Baskin and Robbins!
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
